description.problem: Group field extraction failing for 45% of nodes, resulting in empty strings or empty arrays
description.impact: MEDIUM - Node categorization metadata missing, affecting documentation organization and searchability
description.distribution:
349 files: group=""
376 files: group=[]
47 files: group=["input"], ["output"], etc. (correct)
description.fix_approach:
1. Improve regex pattern for group extraction
2. Parse array values properly (handle both single and multiple values)
3. Ensure consistent array format in output
4. Add validation: group should never be empty string or empty array
